body.about: I'm Manohar, a Fullstack Developer based in Bengaluru, KA I have professional experience in MERN stack and React Native I can build you websites, Android and iOS applications
body.contact: If you have a project that you want to get started, think you need my help with something or just fancy saying hey, then get in touch
